dc_title_s: Map showing the survey of lands lying under the waters of the Hudson River & Bay of New York and of lands adjacent thereto
dc_description_s: Map shows the Passaic River, Newark, Harrison, Elizabeth Port, Shooters Island, Elizabeth, Kill Van Kull, Staten Island, Bergen Point, Bayonne, Newark Bay, Hackensack River, Greenville, Jersey City, Hoboken, Hudson River, NYC, East River, Governor's Island, Buttermilk Channel, Brooklyn, New York Bay, Bedloe's Island, Oyster Island, Ellis Island, and a proposed Channel, exterior line for solid filling, and exterior like for piers.
